risk_title: Service disruption due to unmanaged vulnerabilities
risk_statement: If controls are insufficient, service disruption due to unmanaged vulnerabilities may occur, impacting confidentiality/integrity/availability.

risk_title: Unauthorized access via weak privileged access controls
risk_statement: If controls are insufficient, unauthorized access via weak privileged access controls may occur, impacting confidentiality/integrity/availability.
If controls are insufficient, credential compromise via phishing may occur, impacting confidentiality/integrity/availability.
